Class InternetMeme

  • java.lang.Object
    • InternetMeme

  • public class InternetMeme
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class InternetMeme, which does the following.


    Exercise 2 - Meme sorter and scorer

    I. Read in a list of internet memes from a json file on the classpath.
    II. Calls a method, which takes the list of memes and sorts them by name.
    III. Calls a second method, which:
    1. associates a "lulz" score (from 1-10) with each meme
    2. writes the updated values to the same json file.

                                                      java.lang.String jsonListName)
                                               throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Sort meme list.
        Parameters:
        fullFileName - the full file name that is to be parsed into the JSON Object
        jsonListName - the json list name that is converted to a JSON Array
        Returns:
        the jSON array: the sorted JSON Array
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - the parse exception that may occur if the file (to be made into a JSON Object) is not properly formed
